meanings.definition: The act of putting up posters.
meanings.sent1: Postering is a fun way to decorate your room with colorful pictures.
meanings.sent2: I saw a lot of postering around town for the upcoming concert.
meanings.sent3: The postering in the park made it look like a giant art gallery.
meanings.sent4: Her postering of motivational quotes on the walls inspired everyone who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The postering of missing pets helped reunite them with their owners.

meanings.definition: The practice of advertising through posters.
meanings.sent1: Postering is an effective way to promote events in the community.
meanings.sent2: The company's postering campaign reached a wide audience.
meanings.sent3: The postering for the magic show made the town buzz with excitement.
meanings.sent4: His postering of the new movie made it seem like a must-watch.
